channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A bag of open meat littered by house, 18th June
item.description:
This bag of meat was littered by house. We called police but they said to contact council to remove. Really foul smell and worried about disease spreading. Cannot open windows and balcony due to stench

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Theydon Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over growing tree damaging my property, 18th June
item.description:
I am writing to inform you that a tree from your side of the property is leaning/falling into my garden and is causing damage. I am concerned that this may lead to further damage or pose a safety risk. Could you please look into this matter as soon as possible and take the necessary steps to address it? Thank you for your attention to this issue. I look forward to your prompt response.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
